sentence.Network_en: In the last year of his life he conceived the short - dated Exchequer Bill, still in use.
sentence.Network_cn: 在去世前一年,他拟定了 短期 英国《财政部法案》, 这个法案至今还有效.

sentence.Network_en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentence.Network_cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentence.Network_en: The letter was short — a simple recitation of their problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 信写得很短——只是简单地说了一下他们的问题。

short dates can use either a " / " or " - " date separator , but must follow the month / day / year format , for example " 7 / 20 / 96 " .短日期可使用“/”或“-”日期分隔符，但是必须符合“月/日/年”的格式，例如“7/20/96”。
